statements.select: SELECT * FROM aers_tbl_events_yc where EveresId in (select EveresId from aers_tbl_eventsresume where ExamineState=1 and EveresName='149' and HappenedDate>=#HappenedDate#)
statements.insert: INSERT INTO aers_tbl_events_yc ( EveycId, EveresId, HospId, HospDepId, HappenedDate, HappenedType, SendtoDate, FillStaff, HospNumber, PatientSex, PatientAge, PatientAgeUnit, NursLevel, Diagnosis, PatientHeight, PatientWeight, HemoglobinNum, AlbuminNum, IsEdema, EvaluateStateQt, EvaluateScore, EvaluateDate, EvaluateState, HighRiskLevel, IsTakePrevent, TakePreventQt, OutcomeState, OutcomeQt, AuditFeedback, AuditStatus, Remark, IsFlag, OperatorDate, OperatorID, TakePreventOther, Occurrence, Assessment, AssessmentOther, Highriskgrade ) VALUES ( #EveycId#, #EveresId#, #HospId#, #HospDepId#, #HappenedDate#, #HappenedType#, #SendtoDate#, #FillStaff#, #HospNumber#, #PatientSex#, #PatientAge#, #PatientAgeUnit#, #NursLevel#, #Diagnosis#, #PatientHeight#, #PatientWeight#, #HemoglobinNum#, #AlbuminNum#, #IsEdema#, #EvaluateStateQt#, #EvaluateScore#, #EvaluateDate#, #EvaluateState#, #HighRiskLevel#, #IsTakePrevent#, #TakePreventQt#, #OutcomeState#, #OutcomeQt#, #AuditFeedback#, #AuditStatus#, #Remark#, #IsFlag#, #OperatorDate#, #OperatorID#, #TakePreventOther#, #Occurrence#, #Assessment#, #AssessmentOther#, #Highriskgrade# )
statements.update: UPDATE aers_tbl_events_yc SET EveycId = #EveycId#, EveresId = #EveresId#, HospId = #HospId#, HospDepId = #HospDepId#, HappenedDate = #HappenedDate#, HappenedType = #HappenedType#, SendtoDate = #SendtoDate#, FillStaff = #FillStaff#, HospNumber = #HospNumber#, PatientSex = #PatientSex#, PatientAge = #PatientAge#, PatientAgeUnit=#PatientAgeUnit#, NursLevel = #NursLevel#, Diagnosis = #Diagnosis#, PatientHeight = #PatientHeight#, PatientWeight = #PatientWeight#, HemoglobinNum = #HemoglobinNum#, AlbuminNum = #AlbuminNum#, IsEdema = #IsEdema#, EvaluateStateQt = #EvaluateStateQt#, EvaluateScore = #EvaluateScore#, EvaluateDate = #EvaluateDate#, EvaluateState = #EvaluateState#, HighRiskLevel = #HighRiskLevel#, IsTakePrevent = #IsTakePrevent#, TakePreventQt = #TakePreventQt#, OutcomeState = #OutcomeState#, OutcomeQt = #OutcomeQt#, AuditFeedback = #AuditFeedback#, AuditStatus = #AuditStatus#, Remark = #Remark#, IsFlag = #IsFlag#, OperatorDate = #OperatorDate#, OperatorID = #OperatorID#, TakePreventOther=#TakePreventOther#, Occurrence=#Occurrence#, Assessment=#Assessment#, AssessmentOther=#AssessmentOther#, Highriskgrade=#Highriskgrade# WHERE (EveycId = #EveycId#)
UPDATE aers_tbl_events_yc SET AuditFeedback = #AuditFeedback#, AuditStatus = #AuditStatus# WHERE (EveresId = #EveresId#)
